name: Xodex
description: XODEX transforms decentralized finance by integrating self-custody directly into Telegram through its advanced MPC-powered XOWallet. This secure, user-friendly wallet supports asset storage, management, and omni-chain trading across major blockchains like Kaspa, Ethereum, Solana, and Bitcoin, accessible on mobile, desktop, and tablet. Enhancing the experience, XOAI, XODEX’s proprietary AI Agent, streamlines portfolio management, security, trading, and cross-chain opportunities with intelligent, real-time assistance, making DeFi effortless for users of all levels. In Q1, XODEX’s transition to Proof-of-Stake (PoS) will bring smart contract functionality to the Kaspa ecosystem, enabling liquidity pools, DEX trading, and efficient cross-chain swaps. Users can also stake assets to secure the network and earn rewards. (edited)
